Ability.Name: Berserker Rage
Ability.Lua:
local rage = UnitPower("player") local retal, retalX = GetSpellCooldown(20230) local retalcd = (retal + retalX - GetTime())
if rage <= 95 and retalcd <= .1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Deadly Calm
Ability.Lua:
local retal, retalX = GetSpellCooldown(20230) local retalcd = (retal + retalX - GetTime())
if retalcd <= .1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Inner Rage
Ability.Lua:
local retal, retalX = GetSpellCooldown(20230) local retalcd = (retal + retalX - GetTime()) local dc, dcX = GetSpellCooldown(85730) local dccd = (dc + dcX - GetTime())
if retalcd <= .1 and dccd >= 15 then return true end

Ability.Name: Berserker Stance
Ability.Lua:
local DS = GetShapeshiftForm()
if DS ~= 3 and UnitDebuffID("target", 94009, "player") ~= nil and UnitBuffID("player", 56638) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Battle Stance One
Ability.Lua:
local DS = GetShapeshiftForm()
if DS ~= 1 and UnitDebuffID("target", 94009, "player") == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Rend
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 94009, "player") == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Mortal Strike
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if unithealth > 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Colossus Smash
Ability.Lua:
local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER")
if csDebuff == nil and csDebuffR == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Mortal Strike Two
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local rage = UnitPower("player") local WC = UnitBuffID("player", 57519)
if unithealth < 20 and ((csDebuff == nil and csDebuffR == nil) or rage < 30 or WC == nil) then
return true end

Ability.Name: Battle Stance Two
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local DS = GetShapeshiftForm() local ms, msx = GetSpellCooldown(12294) local mscd = (ms + msx - GetTime()) local retal, retalX = GetSpellCooldown(7384) local retalcd = (retal + retalX - GetTime()) local tfb = UnitBuffID("player", 60503) local rage = UnitPower("player")
if unithealth > 20 and tfb ~= nil and rage <= 75 and mscd >= 1 and (retalcd <= .5 or retalcd == 0) then return true end

Ability.Name: Overpower
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Heroic Strike
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local rage = UnitPower("player") local IR = UnitBuffID("player", 1134)
if UnitBuffID("player", 85730) ~= nil or (unithealth > 20 and rage > 85) or (IR ~= nil and rage > 75) or (UnitBuffID("player", 86627) ~= nil and (unithealth > 20 or (unithealth < 20 and UnitBuffID("player", 85742) ~= nil))) or (IR ~= nil and unithealth > 20 and (rage > 40 or UnitBuffID("player", 85742) ~= nil)) or (IR ~= nil and unithealth <= 20 and (rage >= 50 or UnitBuffID("player", 85742) ~= nil)) then return true end

Ability.Name: Execute
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if unithealth <= 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Colossus Smash Two
Ability.Lua:
local CSTime, _, _, _, _, _, CSExpireTime = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local DS = GetShapeshiftForm()
if CSTime ~= nil then CSTime = CSExpireTime - GetTime() if CSTime <= 1.5 and DS ~= 1 then return true end else return false end

Ability.Name: Colossus Smash Three
Ability.Lua:
local CSTime, _, _, _, _, _, CSExpireTime = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local DS = GetShapeshiftForm()
if CSTime ~= nil then CSTime = CSExpireTime - GetTime() if CSTime <= 1.5 and DS ~= 1 then return true end else return false end

Ability.Name: Slam
Ability.Lua:
local rage = UnitPower("player") local DS = GetShapeshiftForm() local ms, msx = GetSpellCooldown(12294) local mscd = (ms + msx - GetTime())
if rage >= 35 and DS ~= 1 and mscd >= 1 or UnitBuffID("player", 85742) ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Battle Shout
Ability.Lua:
local BS = UnitBuff("player", "6673")
if BS == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Battle Shout Two
Ability.Lua: if UnitPower("player") < 60 then return true end

Ability.Name: Heroic Strikeold
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local rage = UnitPower("player") local csDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 86346, "PLAYER") local csDebuffR = UnitDebuffID("target", 108126, "PLAYER") local IR = UnitBuffID("player", 1134)
if rage >= 85 or UnitBuffID("player", 85730) ~= nil or UnitBuffID("player", 85742) ~= nil or UnitBuffID("player", 86627) ~= nil or (rage >= 75 and IR ~= nil) then return true end

Ability.Name: use trinket 2
Ability.Lua: if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(14) end

Ability.Name: Heroic Leap
Ability.Lua:
local _,HLeap = GetSpellCooldown("Heroic Leap")
if HLeap == 0 and IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus()==nil then CastSpellByName("Heroic Leap") if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: IshtroAoE
Ability.Lua:
cast=CastSpellByName function check(sp,unit) unit = unit or "target"; spell = string.format("%s",sp) if GetSpellCooldown(spell)==0 and IsUsableSpell(spell) then if SpellHasRange(spell)==1 then if IsSpellInRange(spell,unit)~=1 then return false end end else return false end return true end
local _,bscd,_ = GetSpellCooldown("Bladestorm") local _,dccd,_ = GetSpellCooldown("Deadly Calm") if AoEMode then if check("Sweeping Strikes") then cast("Sweeping Strikes") return end if check("Bladestorm") and CheckInteractDistance("target", 3) then cast("Bladestorm") return end if check("Whirlwind") then cast("Whirlwind") return end if check("Inner Rage") and dccd>15 and UnitBuff("player", "Deadly Calm")==nil then cast("Inner Rage") return end if bscd>=2 and check("Cleave") then cast("Cleave") return end end

Ability.Name: -------- AoE --------
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 0.3 then leftkeydown = GetTime() if AoEMode then AoEMode = false print("Rotation mode: \124c98FB982ASingle Target") else AoEMode = true print("Rotation mode: \124cFFF0002AArea of Effect") end end
